video.title: Bad Ink
video.synopsis: Las Vegas tattoo artist Dirk Vermin seeks out awkward, embarrassing and mistake-riddled tattoos, then tries to repair the damage.

episodes.synopsis: Dirk and Ruckus fix a woman's bad birthday tattoo and rescue the victim of romantic disaster by erasing evidence of a love declaration gone wrong.
episodes.title: A Damsel and a Nerd in Need

episodes.synopsis: When a player tries to impress ladies with awful ink, the guys step in to fix the foul marks; a woman with a post-divorce tattoo regrets her decision.
episodes.title: Monkey Business

episodes.synopsis: The guys meet a man with Sea Monkeys making their home on his lower back and a grandmother with a wild past ... and an even more wild tattoo.
episodes.title: Tramp Stamps Gone Wild

episodes.synopsis: A husband asks Dirk and Ruckus to tell his wife that her tat has got to go; the guys turn a novice tattoo artist's awful work into a work of art.
episodes.title: Who Needs a Tattervention?

episodes.synopsis: A fitness model's marks are getting in the way of her career, and Ruckus plays a "private parts" tattoo prank on his unsuspecting buddy Dirk.
episodes.title: When Animal Tattoos Attack

episodes.synopsis: A cop must remove his nickname from his skin or his fiancée is history; and a woman hopes to fix body art she got when she was underage.
episodes.title: Tattoo Crimes and Misdemeanors

episodes.synopsis: Dirk and Ruckus take on a "worst tattoo" challenge between a pair of college pals; Kelly looks to the mark masters to transform her bad breakup ink.
episodes.title: Terrible Tattoo Showdown

episodes.synopsis: Dirk and Ruckus help a new mom who thinks her tattoo terrifies her baby, then meet a fashion guru with no eye for style when it comes to tattoos.
episodes.title: Baby Mama Tattoo Drama

episodes.synopsis: An upset woman calls Dirk and Ruckus to remove the ex-girlfriend tattoo on her boyfriend's arm; a bikini bar waitress regrets her impulsive body art.
episodes.title: All Is Fair in Love and Ink

episodes.synopsis: When Dad's family hates his wife tattoo, Dirk and Ruckus come to the rescue; then, they fix Sharon's pet tattoo, which was inked as a horrible beast.
episodes.title: The Family That Inks Together...

episodes.synopsis: Dirk and Ruckus help a woman "branded" with a rude tattoo, then they meet Brittney, whose bad mood tattoo is a gesture she regrets.
episodes.title: Girls Gone Tattoo Wild

episodes.synopsis: The guys help a former party girl fix a tattoo from her younger, wilder days, then meet a woman with an adorable piggy tat with a naughty backstory.
episodes.title: Show Me Your Tats

episodes.synopsis: The guys are called to make over embarrassing art on a man's derriere; and former rocker Emily begs them to fix her friend's "doodle" on her arm.
episodes.title: Close Encounters of the Butt Kind

episodes.synopsis: A model with a temper asks Dirk and Ruckus to fix her "Suck It Grandma," tat and Dirk's colleague Jonny designs a devilish tattoo for a customer.
episodes.title: Model Misbehavior
